note: GDP per capita data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.
title: Staff compensation as a share of total expenditure in primary public education vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Compensation for staff in [primary education](#dod:primary-education), both teaching and non-teaching, covers salaries, retirement contributions by employers, and additional benefits.

display.name: Staff compensation as % of expenditure in primary public institutions
